title: Drawing, "International Casino: Sand Jar", August 4, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout; inscribed in graphite in stamp: 546-82; 3"=1'; KAS. / D.[overlapping] / 8/4/37.; 0/4/ 3 BRECKER; above stamp: SCALE DRAWING SAND JAR/INTERNATIONAL CASINO/QUANITY - 12; lower left: PLAN/SCALE 3"=1'-0"/NOTE: SPINNING HEAVY GUAGE [sic] BRASS/WITH EDGES REINFORCED; upper left: TOP SPINNING/POL. CHROME/BOTTOM SPINNING/BAKED ENAMEL/FINISH RED TO/MATCH WALLS
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of a sand jar. Cylindrical shape; top in polished chromium with one inch deep tray, bottom in red ename (to match wall color)l. Instructions for twelve jars to be made.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: Sand Jar", August 4, 1937.
August 4, 1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-200.
